data.name: Crown of Pain Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Crown of Pain Soundtrack features 4 tracks that were made using cello, piano, djembe, voice, Latvian national instrument kokle and electronics.

Crown of Pain Soundtrack is made by maяk, a latvian duo, who performs music in the improvised ambient and electronic genres.
